spike_pit_simple.name: Simple Spike Pit
spike_pit_simple.description: A crudely dug pit with sharpened stakes at the bottom. Looks painful.
spike_pit_simple.messageOnDetect: You spot some disturbed earth and what might be the edge of a hidden pit!
spike_pit_simple.messageOnDisarmSuccess: You carefully disable the spike pit.
spike_pit_simple.messageOnDisarmFailure: Your attempt to disarm the trap fails, but you avoid triggering it... this time.
spike_pit_simple.messageOnTrigger: You fall into a spike pit!

pressure_plate_darts.name: Pressure Plate Dart Trap
pressure_plate_darts.description: A pressure plate is cleverly hidden in the floor. It likely triggers a mechanism.
pressure_plate_darts.messageOnDetect: You notice a slight seam around a floor tile; it might be a pressure plate.
pressure_plate_darts.messageOnDisarmSuccess: You've successfully disabled the pressure plate mechanism.
pressure_plate_darts.messageOnDisarmFailureMishap: As you fumble with the mechanism, you hear a click and darts shoot out!
pressure_plate_darts.messageOnDisarmFailureSafe: You fail to disable the pressure plate, but manage not to set it off.
pressure_plate_darts.messageOnTrigger: You step on a pressure plate! Darts shoot out from the walls!

tripwire_alarm.name: Tripwire Alarm
tripwire_alarm.description: A thin wire is strung across the path at ankle height.
tripwire_alarm.messageOnDetect: You spot a faint glint of a wire stretched across the path.
tripwire_alarm.messageOnDisarmFailure: You fail to disable the tripwire.
tripwire_alarm.messageOnTrigger: You stumble on a tripwire, and a loud noise erupts!
